mapper.insert:
insert into drg_dip_business_opt_info_log (
id ,
qulity_id ,
business_id ,
opt_type ,
opt_type_name ,
type ,
business_type ,
is_force ,
force_upload_info ,
hosp_code ,
insure_reg_code ,
hosp_name ,
org_code ,
insure_settle_id ,
medical_reg_no ,
settle_id ,
visit_id ,
psn_no ,
ps_name ,
certno ,
dept_id ,
sex ,
age ,
insue_type ,
inpt_time ,
outpt_time ,
med_type ,
med_type_name ,
dept_name ,
doctor_id ,
doctor_name ,
inpt_diagnose ,
outpt_diagnose ,
total_fee ,
pay_fee ,
self_fee ,
cash_pay_fee ,
input_json ,
valid_flag ,
crt_id ,
crt_name ,
crt_time
) values (
#{id},
#{qulityId},
#{businessId},
#{optType},
#{optTypeName},
#{type},
#{businessType},
#{isForce},
#{forceUploadInfo},
#{hospCode},
#{insureRegCode},
#{hospName},
#{orgCode},
#{insureSettleId},
#{medicalRegNo},
#{settleId},
#{visitId},
#{psnNo},
#{psName},
#{certno},
#{deptId},
#{sex},
#{age},
#{insueType},
#{inptTime},
#{outptTime},
#{medType},
#{medTypeName},
#{deptName},
#{doctorId},
#{doctorName},
#{inptDiagnose},
#{outptDiagnose},
#{totalFee},
#{payFee},
#{selfFee},
#{cashPayFee},
#{inputJson},
#{validFlag},
#{crtId},
#{crtName},
#{crtTime}
)
mapper.select: select id , qulity_id , business_id , opt_type , opt_type_name , type , business_type , is_force , force_upload_info , hosp_code , insure_reg_code , hosp_name , org_code , insure_settle_id , medical_reg_no , settle_id , visit_id , psn_no , ps_name , certno , dept_id , sex , age , insue_type , inpt_time , outpt_time , med_type , med_type_name , dept_name , doctor_id , doctor_name , inpt_diagnose , outpt_diagnose , total_fee , pay_fee , self_fee , cash_pay_fee , input_json , valid_flag , crt_id , crt_name , crt_time from drg_dip_business_opt_info_log where id = #{id}
